channel.title: How do i make a server online
channel.description: im new and ive tried EVERYTHING but still no progress please help me.

item.title: How do i make a server online
item.dc:creator: @Takashi9034 Takashi9034
item.description:
@Takashi9034 wrote:

umm thankyou for the help and thanks for not flaming at me… btw ill use your information TY

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a server online
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“roger, post:11, topic:230989”][quote author=the soul link=topic=304172.msg2443443#msg2443443 date=1221592640]

As long as you got Jave JRE installed the server will run

You will also need a client

Your Server IP will be 0.0.0.0 or localhost or even 127.0.0.1

Look in the downloads forum for a client and next time maybe look in the tutorials

roger, he is asking how to run a server online so other people can play his server. Also, don’t tell him how to do this in this thread. Either use the private message option or wait til he posts in RS2 Server Tutorials, because this is the wrong section.
[/quote]

Alright

Thank you for informing me ;)[/quote]
No problem, just trying to help.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a server online
